name: Stark Skin v3.1
description:
Stark Skin for asoiaf.westeros.org

Version 3.1 - amendments for new page border style, lighter grey for unread topics
Version 3.0 - Stark skin for new Westeros design Oct 2011
Version 2.0 - Stark skin for new Westeros layout Apr 2011
Version 1.2 - Fixed messenger table position
Version 1.1 - Fixed forum link colours, thread subtitle colour, forum maintitle colour, footer link colours, pop-up box border colour
Version 1.0.2 - Fixed username on profile page
Version 1.0.1 - Fixed posted date
Version 1.0
